name: OpenSky LAANC
description: This platform, built for Aeronyde Corporation, allows commercial drone/UAV users to safely integrate into airspace, and is approved by the FAA. My role: Front End Developer

name: HOSI Mobile App
description: I rebuilt and redesigned the Hospice of Southern Illinois mobile application using React Native with Expo. The app is currently deployed on Google Play and the Apple App Store.

name: Memory Game
description: You must have a good memory to win this 'The Office' themed Memory Game! This app demonstrates basic logic and state management using React.

name: Stripe Integration
description: This is a Demo application for a Stripe integration working with React, Express, and Node

name: Star Wars Game
description: This is one of my very first applications written using HTML, Javascript and jQuery! The goal of this game is to defeat all of your chosen character's enemies one by one before they defeat you.

name: Train Times
description: Train Times is a simple Firebase database integration application that allows users to input their favorite trains to keep track of arrival times.

name: Friends API
description: This simple friends API builder takes in form data like a survey, then compares the user's data against the current friends API list to find the best 'friend' match.

name: Hangman
description: This is a 'Disney' themed Hangman Game. Just like the traditional game, you will guess the letters of the word by typing the letter on your keyboard. The hint is...Disney!
